phrases: I did not have the energy to come up with excuses
like the bed was too small or that I forgot my wallet.
When I was unbearably lonely,
it was not Ren...
who I wanted to have by my side.
Blinking eyes call the wind
A smile clears all the noise away
The angel in your eyes whispers
Everything begins now
Can you feel it now Can you feel it now
It is like being caught in a wave
Pulling on my heart Pulling on my heart
Breath held, arms reaching out
Baby this world is different from yesterday's
You are the only one I can see
Baby my wish on a wing
This sky is torn
By a single overflowing word
Wow!
What a great vocalist!
Where did you find her?
She is Ren's girl, is not she?
Yeah.
But before that, she was Nobu's classmate, and...
She is great!
She is got the looks, and a great voice.
She is so cool.
I really think you have got a chance.
I finally understand what made you decide to go pro, Yasu.
You had this secret weapon.
Well, I am not so confident we will make it that big, but...
Well, depending on how it is done,
Nana's got potential to be a great solo artist.
Are you at all serious about doing this?
Who could it be this late at night?
Reira?
A new scandal uncovered?!
Maybe it is a neighbor complaining about the noise.
Huh?
Is not this place soundproof?
What is the point of having your drums here then.
Hello.
I am sorry for making all this noise.
Yasu,.,
Who is it?!
What is the matter?
Yasu, I will be going home.
Yeah.
Sorry.
No, it is okay.
Thanks for your time.
NAOKI GREAT SCOOP!
NAOKI GREAT SCOOP!
Great Scoop!
NAOKI GREAT SCOOP!
REN's WOMAN CAME To YASU'S PLACE CRYING!
WHAT IS GOING ON?
KYAAA!
A PAPA-RAKKYO!!
REN'S WOMAN CAME TO YASU'S PLACE CRYING!
WHAT IS GOING ON?
KYAAA!
A PAPA-RAKKYO!!
Ren's woman came to Yasu's place crying!
REN'S WOMAN CAME TO YASU'S PLACE CRYING!
WHAT IS GOING ON?
KYAAA!
A PAPA-RAKKYO!!
REN'S WOMAN CAME TO YASU'S PLACE CRYING!
WHAT IS GOING ON?
KYAAA!
A PAPA-RAKKYO!!
What is going on?
Kyaaa A papa-rakkyo!!
Takumi got Hachi pregnant!
It is got to be Takumi's kid!
Hachi said he would do it without a condom!
What?!
Doing it without any protection is inexcusable!
DIZZY
DIZZY
She is being a tattletale.
It is open.
Nana, are you asleep?
Nana...
I am coming in.
Nana!
Do not scare me like that, damn it!
I told you, I am a sensitive man.
And where is Nobu?
HACHIKO NOBUO
Do you love him that much?
Did not you break up with him?
Please make up an excuse.
I do not care if it is a lie.
I will believe you.
Who could it be at this hour?
I can only think of two insolent people
who would come by someone is place in the middle of the night unannounced.
Yeah.
I wonder which one it is.
Yes?
Which one is it?
WHICH ONE?
Yes?
Which one is it?
WHICH ONE?
Jun-chan.
I was suffering so badly...
I could barely breathe.
Before I knew it, I was here.
I poured my entire heart out, but I am not sure
whether or not I was able to explain myself well enough.
Why do I want Hachi so much?
Why do I hate Takumi so much?
I do not even know myself.
Nobu said that I am strange.
Am I strange?
What is a friend supposed to do at a time like this?
I want to become...
normal friends with Hachi.
Yasu listened to everything I said without saying a word.
He might have said something to comfort me from time to time.
To be honest, I do not remember.
But I remember...
for some reason,
being enveloped by the sweet smell of Black Stone calmed me down.
Kyosuke, do not smoke!
Oh, right.
I am sorry.
I am sorry, Kyosuke.
No, it is okay.
I mean, guys are pathetic.
We do not know what to do at a time like this.
How come you are nervous?!
Well, you are right, but it makes me feel bad.
On the other hand...
Takumi, was it?
From what I hear from you,
he seems to be almost too manly and decisive about this.
I am impressed.
Really?
To me, he just sounds like some coercive guy thinking only of himself!
You think so?
Think about it.
He used Nana's cell phone to call Nobu out of the blue
and talk to him about this.
It is natural for Nobu to be overly suspicious of Nana and quail.
He is trying to take away Nobu's will to fight for Nana
and encourage him to withdraw.
On top of that, he locked himself in Nana's room so she could not interfere.
If he was really thinking of Nana, he would not have taken such actions.
He is the type of person who would
manipulate others without thinking twice about it if it is for his own good.
If he really planned all that on the spur of the moment,
he is an extremely clever guy.
In a way, I am impressed.
I am pretty sure Takumi did not give it that much thought.
It is because I told him that Nobu's my boyfriend,
so he simply did it outta jealousy.
Oh, is not that nice.
It is just that he has a lot of pride.
You call that pride?
Huh?
If those are his true feelings,
then he is as immature as a kid whose toy's been taken away.
- You may be right.
- Really?
SCALE - You may be right.
- Really?
Oh well, in any case, he is got to be pretty serious about this
to say he will be the child's guardian.
If he was a classmate of Yasu, then that would make him 23 or 24, right?
Is he financially sound?
What does he do?
He is a musician.
Is that not a concern?!
Does he make any money?!
Why are you keeping quiet?
Well, if he said he will be the guardian without hesitation,
he is got to be somewhat financially sound.
I actually do not like the way he used the word guardian.
That is almost like saying, I will pay child support.
But I think that is what he meant.
Huh?
What the hell?!
Why will not he marry you?!
Does he have a wife and kids?
Is this another extramarital affair?
No.
But getting married would be a great burden to him.
I could not impose on him like that.
I do not get you!
Are you okay with that?!
That is good enough for me.
So you want to have this baby that much?
At first, I hoped that it was just my imagination.
I was escaping from myself, trying not to think about it.
But there were signs,
so I became more and more anxious.
So when the test showed positive,
it scared me because it was like I no longer had anywhere to escape.
I thought, if I really am pregnant,
I should get an abortion right away.
I could keep the abortion a secret from everyone,
and continue on with my life... as if nothing had happened.
But then at the hospital,
I realized that there was, in fact, a child living inside me.
It was like reality suddenly struck me.
OBSTETRICS AND GYNECOLOGY NAKAZATO CLINIC
OBSTETRICS AND GYNECOLOGY NAKAZATO CLINIC
I thought to myself that
OBSTETRICS AND GYNECOLOGY NAKAZATO CLINIC
I would never want to have an abortion and pretend nothing happened.
I no longer had a sense of fear or anxiety.
All I could think about then was that I had to pull myself together.
I do not know how to say it, but...
like, I felt that I am the only one who can protect the life of the child inside me.
I thought about the possibility of giving birth
and raising the child on my own.
But I do not have any money.
In addition, I cannot work because my morning sickness is so bad.
I was at a complete loss,
thinking that there is no way I am going to make it.
So when Takumi said what he did to me,
it surprised me, but it made me really happy.
Maybe I should not be relying on him, but...
No, there is nothing wrong with that.
It is most likely his child, right?
Nobu was using protection at all times, right?
So chances of the child being his are low.
It is a horrible situation, is not it?
Nobu always used protection.
And he treated me like I was so precious.
But I am trampling all over that
and am running to Takumi to have the baby.
Can someone so selfish be forgiven?
Well, Nobu may never forgive you.
Given the circumstances, it appears that he believes
you were dating them both at the same time.
No, I think she needs to resolve this misunderstanding.
But how?
There is no proof.
I do not think he will believe her explanations.
What I am saying is, from Nobu's perspective,
he probably wanted her to explain things just to show that she cares.
That could even light a flame to his fighting spirit,
and he will say, I will take care of everything.
For Nobu's sake, he may be better off not having such a flame lit.
Because you cannot raise a kid on love alone.
He would no longer be in a position to dream about his band succeeding.
He might hafta give up his dream and take over his family inn.
I will do everything I can to make you happy.
It is one thing if the child were his without a doubt.
He is only twenty, right?
It would be too cruel to have his future decided in this way.
And that is why you felt it is not right to rely on Nobu, right, Nana?
I guess it is not something you could say to him.
Nana, you really are seriously in love with Nobu.
She is Nobu's girlfriend, but she is also a follower of BLAST.
The success of the guru and her group is her dream as well.
Life does not always go as planned, does it?
Maybe there really is a Demon Lord.
What are you saying?!
It is Nana's fault for not insisting on protection!
And also for doing it with Nobu right after without any decent break in between!
Your tendency to get carried away in your foolish actions
has finally caught up with you!
Do you understand that?!
This is not the time to be lecturing her.
This is about the only time Nana will listen to me!
DO NOT SPOIL HER!
This is about the only time Nana will listen to me!
Do you really understand that you cannot have a normal happy family
with a guy who will not marry you?
Uh-huh.
Then you would better be faithful to that man for the rest of your life.
You are prepared to properly break up with Nobu and give him up, are you?
I want to hear your answer!
Yes!
Even if the child is Nobu's,
you will have no problem raising the child as Takumi's, will you?
Keep in mind that even if Takumi becomes the child's guardian,
whether he will love the child or not is a different issue.
Yes.
Okay.
If you want to have it that bad,
I will not stop you.
As long as you never forget that determination you have.
Yes.
Now that you have made that commitment,
I do not want to ever see you crying over this.
I pity a kid who has to put up with such a gloomy mother.
Try to be like your own mother.
Bye.
I am really grateful for everything, Jun-chan, Kyosuke.
I feel much better now that I had you hear what I had to say.
I will be in touch.
At the least, take good care of your body.
Stay well.
Mhm.
I wonder if she really plans to have it.
It not only affects the rest of Nana's life,
this is also about the life of a child.
I am so worried I am getting a stomachache.
But Nana came to that decision herself,
so we really do not have the right to interfere with that decision.
The best we can do now is just to support her.
I guess you are right.
Nana's dream was to become a normal housewife.
If she had an abortion and things went well with Nobu,
her dream might have come true in the near future.
But she is sacrificing that to have this baby.
She must be really determined.
But as her father, I would have loved to see Nana in a wedding dress.
Father, you say?
FATHER
Father, you say?
Why will not Takumi take Nana as his wife?
Probably because Nana's harder to take care of than the child.
I see.
Huh?
My keys...
Nana!
Oops, I fell asleep.
Where did you go leaving the door unlocked?
I was worried.
Did you talk things over with Nobu?
Ah, yes.
Sorry.
I thought you had gone home.
I went shopping.
Want some grapefruit juice?
Damn!
I should have put it in the fridge.
Yasu, you mind if I have one?
Go ahead.
Smoking's so tough to quit.
It is unlike me to try and be stoic about it.
It is stressing me out in other areas.
That is right.
There is not much meaning for you to quit smoking,
so do not force yourself.
Is not it more proper for you to tell me to quit
because it is bad for my health?
I cannot tell someone to do anything I cannot do myself.
Does it taste good?
It is terrible.
I should be heading back.
The first train will be running shortly.
Huh?
Sorry for intruding when Naoki was here.
Are you dating him?
No.
Somehow I think he got the wrong idea,
but tell him I said hi.
Are you all right, Nana?
Huh?
What about?
You idiot!
I am not that broken.
Do not worry.
I will be fine.
I do not really know what a normal friendship is, but...
No matter what Hachi decides to do,
I will not get in the way and I will gently watch over her.
Exactly like you are doing with me.
It is not as easy as it sounds.
I am sorry, Yasu.
Thank you.
Do not worry.
Everything will be fine.
Because Hachi and I are both women.
But maybe that is why it is so difficult.
I begin recording today.
I am sorry.
No, it is okay.
We start in the afternoon.
But we will be confined to the studio for at least a week.
So before I go, could you let me know what you decided?
As things are, I would feel so restless
I would not be able to keep my mind on work.
Sorry for being so pushy.
I want to have this child and raise it as your child, Takumi.
If it is okay with you.
Want To get married?
Huh?
You do not want to raise it as an illegitimate child, do you?
If the public finds out, it will look bad no matter how we spin it.
But if we get married, there should not be a problem.
Besides, if I marry an ordinary girl
the media will not go too crazy over this.
No?
No matter what path in life you take with who,
as long as you are happy, then that is fine with me.
I may never become a person
who can wish for that from the bottom of my heart...
But I wanted to appear strong and graceful in your eyes.
Like a manga heroine, who is too perfect to be real.
I cannot count how many nights
I wished tomorrow would never come
To live as I am without being fake
What do I need
If I do not believe in myself, what can I believe in
The answer is too close to see
Black tears are falling down
I have nothing, only sadness
I cannot put it into words
My whole body starts to ache
I cannot stand it anymore on my own
